mapper.insert: insert into Purchase( PURCHASE_ID,PURCHASE_COST,PAYMENT_METHOD,PURCHASE_DATE,EMAIL,SALE_ID, PURCHASE_DEADLINE,PURCHASE_STATUS, USE_POINT )values(#{purchase_id}, #{purchase_cost}, #{payment_method}, sysdate, #{email}, #{sale_id}, sysdate +1, #{purchase_status}, #{use_point})
